example: This painting embodies the spirit of the revolution and will make people stunned by the view.

The troops were dispatched to the border.

The dog was trained to retrieve the ball.
The river began to overflow its banks.
The company was ordered to cease operations.
The eagle soared high in the sky.
It was a mere scratch, nothing serious.
The building was engulfed in flames.
Police are investigating the strange occurrences.

definition: (n) perasaan benci karena merasa diperlakukan tidak adil.
example: She felt a growing resentment towards her boss.
The project harnesses the power of the sun.

definition: (v) turun dari tempat yang lebih tinggi.
example: The plane slowly descends for landing.
Is this a viable solution to the problem?
She is a renowned scientist.
He is an esteemed colleague.
The streets were filled with revelry during the festival.
A cool breeze blew through the open window.
He traveled thither with great determination.
He devoured the pizza in just a few minutes.
The teacher imparts knowledge to the students.
The forest was aflame after the lightning strike.
The magician captivated the audience with his tricks.
The rescue team was their only salvation during the storm.
The fireworks were a magnificent spectacle.
Her speech was imbued with passion and hope.
He had impeccable manners and was admired by everyone.
They vowed to remain friends forever.

definition: (n) orang atau sumber yang memberi nasihat bijak.
example: In ancient Greece, people visited oracles for guidance.
His harsh words only served to exacerbate the tense situation.

definition: (v) merengek; mengeluh dengan suara yang menyedihkan.
example: The child whined when he was told it was time for bed.
The new law will proscribe the use of certain chemicals in food production.
The explorers embarked on a perilous journey through the dense jungle.
She gave him a smile of reassurance before his big presentation.
I was offended by his condescending tone when he explained the simple task.
The supplies were inadequate to meet the needs of the refugees.
The clever detective ensnared the criminal in his own web of lies.
The city is known for its towering skyscrapers that dominate the skyline.
He found a moment of peace amidst the chaos of the crowded market.
She overtly expressed her disapproval of the new policy during the meeting.
He would always flaunt his expensive new car to make his friends envious.
The teacher was revered by all her students for her dedication and kindness.

definition: (v) mengumpulkan informasi atau fakta sedikit demi sedikit.
example: The journalist tried to glean as much information as possible from the witnesses.
He beckoned her hither with a wave of his hand.

definition: (v) memperhatikan atau mematuhi nasihat, peringatan, atau instruksi.
example: He is not heeding the doctor's advice to rest.

definition: (adj/v) gugup atau terguncang karena sesuatu; berbunyi bergetar.
example: She was visibly rattled by the unexpected question.

definition: (adj) seperti berasal dari dunia lain; sangat asing atau tidak biasa.
example: The landscape had an otherworldly beauty after the snowfall.
The police had to divert traffic because of the accident.

definition: (n) rasa pahit; perasaan benci atau dendam.
example: There was a hint of bitterness in his voice when he spoke about his past.
Many plants perished during the severe drought.

definition: (n) tindakan balasan atau pencegahan untuk mengatasi ancaman atau masalah.
example: The government implemented countermeasures to prevent the spread of the virus.

definition: (n) kelayakan; kemungkinan untuk dilakukan atau dicapai.
example: The team conducted a study to assess the feasibility of the new project.

definition: (n) gelombang kecil di permukaan air; efek yang menyebar dari suatu kejadian.
example: The news sent ripples through the entire community.

definition: (v) bertemu atau bergerak menuju satu titik yang sama.
example: The two rivers are converging just south of the city.
Her achievements are surpassing everyone's expectations.

definition: (v) mengembalikan ke posisi atau keadaan semula.
example: The employee was reinstated after the investigation proved his innocence.

definition: (n) kesulitan atau keadaan yang tidak menguntungkan.
example: He showed great courage in the face of adversity.

definition: (adj) bersifat mengulang dirinya sendiri; berulang secara berurutan di dalam dirinya.
example: The function is recursive because it calls itself during execution.

definition: (v) mencegah / menghalangi seseorang melakukan sesuatu, terutama dengan menimbulkan rasa takut atau ragu.
example: Strict laws are designed to deter people from committing crimes.

definition: (v) menang atau unggul; berhasil mengatasi sesuatu.
example: Justice will prevail in the end.

definition: (v) berhasil mencegah atau menghindari sesuatu yang buruk.
example: Disaster was averted thanks to quick action.

No one is infallible; everyone makes mistakes.

She is a prominent figure in the community.

definition: (v) dipenuhi atau dibekali dengan perasaan atau kualitas tertentu.
example: Her writing is imbued with optimism.
